type.name: T:Elysium.Parameters.DropDown
type.summary: Represents a class, which manages the settings of the style of the DropDown list (also manages a submenu with such a style).

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.DropDown.IsOpen
property.summary: Gets or sets the value, that indicates whether the dropdown list is opened at the moment.
property.value: True, if the list is opened; otherwise False. The default value is false.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.DropDown.GetIsOpen(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: The value, that indicates whether the dropdown list is opened at the moment.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.DropDown.SetIsOpen(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup,System.Boolean)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
The value, that indicates whether the dropdown list is opened at the moment.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.DropDown.IsDefaultHorizontalPosition
property.summary: Returns the value, that indicates whether the current horizontal position of the dropdown list and the default value are equal.
property.value: True, if the values are equal; otherwise False. The default value is false.

example.code: var control = new Popup(); var currentValue = Parameters.DropDown.GetIsDefaultHorizontalPosition(control);

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.DropDown.GetIsDefaultHorizontalPosition(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: Returns the value, that indicates whether the current horizontal position of the dropdown list and the default value are equal.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.DropDown.IsDefaultVerticalPosition
property.summary: Returns the value, that indicates whether the current vertical position of the dropdown list and the default value are equal.
property.value: True, if the values are equal; otherwise False. The default value is false.

example.code: var control = new Popup(); var currentValue = Parameters.DropDown.GetIsDefaultVerticalPosition(control);

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.DropDown.GetIsDefaultVerticalPosition(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: Returns the value, that indicates whether the current vertical position of the dropdown list and the default value are equal.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

field.name: F:Elysium.Parameters.DropDown.PopupPlacementCallback
field.summary: Returns the delegate used for calculating the position of the dropdown list.
field.value: Returns the delegate used for calculating the position of the dropdown list.
